content:
Summarize this event. In particular, tell me:
        - Event organizer (no contact info)
        - Time and date
        - Room booked
        - Number of attendees
        - Event type
        - Catering or drink packages and choices. If they choose catering or drink packages, be careful and detailed with their choices.
        - Special requests in the notes
        - When the organizer last emailed
        - Payment information (but no etransfer information).

          Respond in bullet points or short sentences.
          Be detalied about special requests by organizers. 

        Event details: {"name":"Camila Sabbag Massera","email":"camila@sabbag.ca","phone":"2898794799","startTime":"2024-11-13 20:00","endTime":"2024-11-14 00:00","room":"Lounge","attendance":"100","partyType":"semi-formal event","services":"bar;lights;audio;music;kareoke","notes":"$200 deposit to book\nLight catering for 100 people"}
        Recent email conversation: Hi Camila,

Hope you're having a great weekend! I recall texting you answering your
questions regarding catering and ID check. Here is the quote with security
and without security:

With security
[image: WhatsApp Image 2024-11-10 at 13.35.02.png]

Without security

[image: Screenshot 2024-11-10 at 1.37.33 PM.png]

TacoTaco Events Team
(647) 692-4768
<https://www.google.com/search?q=tacotaco&oq=tacotaco&gs_lcrp=EgZjaHJvbWUyBggAEEUYOTIJCAEQABgKGIAEMhIIAhAuGAoYrwEYxwEYgAQYjgUyEAgDEC4YrwEYxwEYgAQYjgUyCQgEEAAYChiABDIHCAUQABiABDIGCAYQRRg9MgYIBxBFGEHSAQgxNjc3ajBqN6gCALACAA&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8#>
 | info@eattaco.ca
eattaco.ca



On Wed, Nov 6, 2024 at 6:33â€¯PM Camila Sabbag <camila@sabbag.ca> wrote:

> Hello, I dropped off the cheque today! I wanted to confirm that we were
> going with the 6$/person food package. How will the food be served?
>
> Also, I wanted to have IDs checked when people enter and have the underage
> guests marked with an X on their hand, as that is one of our policies. Is
> it possible to have someone at the door doing this? If IDs need to be
> checked again at the bar, that's fine! I read through the contract that
> security can be hired for 25$ an hour, could I get the final amount due
> with and without security so I can get that to our finance team, that would
> be very helpful!
>
> Camila Sabbg Massera
> (289)-879-4799
> camila@sabbag.ca
>

- **Event Organizer:** Camila Sabbag Massera  
- **Time and Date:** November 13, 2024, from 8:00 PM to November 14, 2024, 12:00 AM  
- **Room Booked:** Lounge  
- **Number of Attendees:** 100  
- **Event Type:** Semi-formal event  
- **Catering or Drink Packages and Choices:**  
  - Catering chosen: Light catering for 100 people  
  - Food package: $6 per person  
- **Special Requests in the Notes:**  
  - Request for ID checks at the entrance to mark underage guests with an "X" on their hands.  
  - Inquiring about having someone at the door for ID checks.  
  - Interest in receiving a quote with and without security.  
- **When the Organizer Last Emailed:** November 6, 2024  
- **Payment Information:** A deposit of $200 has been made to book the event.
